comment: She was a good professor although you don't have to show up to pass. All of the tests and quizzes were pretty straightforward and just going over the powerpoint helps a lot.

Good teacher. Quiz every week which was open notes. 4 discussion post that were easy. test reviews before every test. test were open for a week but there was a time limit. if you know everything that is on the study guide, you'll get a good grade. lockdown browser. Easy class

Overall really solid teacher she's really straight-forward making the class easier. it is also really easy to get a hold of her whether it be office hours or an email. she's just a pretty solid professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Easy A. There is 1 term paper, which is extremely easy. A couple of discussions, 3 exams and a weekly chapter quiz. Each chapter quiz is open note! All the notes are posted online. Her study guides are a reflection of the actual exam. Her powerpoints are not long as well. She is very helpful and accessible outside of the classroom
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I didn't go to this class once and still got an A. All the notes were posted online and all tests and quizzes were taken at home. There's a chapter quiz every week but it is an open note. There are 3-4 discussions due and 3-4 tests. Very easy as long as you look at the notes and powerpoints.

Professor Owens is so boring. Her lectures aren't engaging at all, will drive you to sleep. Grading is easy, just do what's asked. I wouldn't recommend. Take a different professor especially if this is your major or else you won't really learn much from the lectures, you'll be passing just because the assignments aren't that difficult.

Assignments were very easy and had clear instructions. She responds quickly to emails and is very helpful if you have any doubt concerning the material. Her tests were compatible to her lectures. If you study and watch the lectures you should get a good grade. I recommend taking psych with her.

She was a pretty chill teacher, but did get a bit hung up on apa format. Weekly quizzes, and a few exams but the study guides were very similar to the test. A small final paper and discussion questions. Overall okay, she didn't really make an impression but she always offered her help!

Professor Owens does not really teach. But, if you are fine with reading the textbook, and having little to no interaction with your professor take her. Just note there is a quiz every week on the chapter read which is easy open note quizzes. The study guide is basically the tests, and one paper (easy). Just put in the effort and do everything on t

a really good professor. the weekly quizzes are all open note and she creates REALLY good powerpoints. theyre basically the answers to the quizzes. you dont NEED the book but it helps sometimes. the test arent open note and are webcamed (theyre kinda hard but if you study youll be fine). the discussion post are relevant and really easy too.

All quizzes are open note and theres a lot of them, the final for the class is like a regular test just on the last few chapters. She gives you slideshows and i just print them out and use those as notes, there really is no need to write down any notes. You have to write one paper but its short and there is few discussion posts.

The class was extremely easy, so it was an easy A. However the professor seemed very unmotivated and disconnected. Course material was often posted late, things change last minute, the professor wasn't very helpful and even came across as rude in some emails. I would avoid unless looking for easy A. I give some slack due to COVID but yeah :/

This class was online due to COVID. There's a quiz each week on Lockdown Browser, but they are open notes. The 3 tests you will take are also on lockdown; they are NOT open notes. You MUST read the textbook, though her lectures are full of the information you will need to pass. I thoroughly enjoyed this class.
